Overrides.Override: +1 to Level of all Intelligence Skill Gems Limited to 1 Attribute Notable Tattoo

PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^x7070FFHow to use this POB^7^7^7^7
- Choose one of the Passive Skill presets. There's one for each act and three for maps. - Choose the according Gem Preset. There's one for Early Maps and two for Endgame. - Choose the according Gear Preset. There's one for Early Maps and one for Endgame, and a few separate gear choices for each. - Adjust your Level and Configurations accordingly. E.g. you won't fight Pinnacle Bosses with the Early Maps preset. - Delete the Custom Modifiers and check Convergence for peak DPS
^x7070FF^x7070FFPlease check the guide if anything isn't clear, it most likely is answered in there!^7^7
